failure.message:
1. Test Case ID: 1qjFtO
- API accepts requests without authentication
Expected 401, got `403 Forbidden` for `GET /api/alerts/v2/notifications/`
[403] Forbidden:
`{"detail":"User Not authenticated"}`
Reproduce with:
curl -X GET 'https://test-v2.tramatch.com/api/alerts/v2/notifications/?read=true&per_page=20'

1. Test Case ID: 1qjFtO

Reproduce with:

1. Test Case ID: xVVTNn
- Missing header not rejected
Missing header not rejected (got 404, expected 401)
- Undocumented HTTP status code
Received: 404 Documented: 200, 422
[404] Not Found:
`{"detail":"Notification not found"}`
Reproduce with:
curl -X GET https://test-v2.tramatch.com/api/alerts/v2/notifications/0

- Missing header not rejected
Missing header not rejected (got 200, expected 401)
[200] OK:
`{"message":"Succesfully deleted items"}`

1. Test Case ID: uRGCvA
- Server error

`Internal Server Error`
